title: Spacious top floor 2 bedroom with a gorgeous water view!
posting_body: - Schedule an in person tour link: <URL>
- For questions please call or text:
- Professionally Managed by Real Property Associates
- Beautiful top floor unit in a duplex home with a gorgeous water view
- 180 degree, unimpeded views of Commencement Bay
- Bright with large windows and spacious closets
- Fabulous location in the heart of Tacoma, minutes from the freeway
- Quiet and private street with ample parking
- Walk to coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, express bus lines and parks
- Common basement washer/dryer with additional storage
- Last month's rent due at move in
- Renter's Insurance required and part of Resident Benefit Package ($19.95 monthly)
- Pet/Animal screening profile required as part of the application process ($30 each application)
